text: None of the provisions of §§ 9-103.01 to 9-103.05 shall apply to any segment of the Interstate System within the District of Columbia.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 7-112.

1973 Ed., § 7-112a.

References in Text

"Section 9-103.05", referred to in the catchline and text, was repealed by § 711 of D.C. Law 4-201, effective March 10, 1983.

DC CODE § 9-103.06

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Inapplicability of §§ 9-103.01 to 9-103.05 to Interstate System.
